name: Tron (itch) (NiTeGamesStudio)
description:
This Konstantin's entry for our inside Game-Jam. The members of our team decided to compete against each other in order to determine the new leader. The theme - remaking retro games.

The main point of the game is to make the other player collide with you trail.

This remix of Tron present 3 unique characters - Thunder, Proton and Quark. Each one has unique abilities. Thunder can become faster for short time. Proton can stop her trail for a while and Quark can teleport a bit in front.

HOW TO DOWNLOAD:

1. Press the download button
2. Right click on the .zip folder
3. Extract all...
4. Open the .exe with the games name
